articles.author: AP
articles.title: Mbappe misses penalty as France exit Euro 2020, Sommer time in Switzerland - The Indian Express
articles.description: France is out of the European Championship, and it was Kylian Mbappe that missed the penalty kick in the shootout. Switzerland fill face Spain in the next round.
articles.content:
France is out of the European Championship, and it was Kylian Mbappe that missed the penalty kick in the dreaded shootout.
Switzerland eliminated the World Cup champions 5-4 in the shootout after a … [+1808 chars]

articles.title: Oil Falls Sharply Ahead Of OPEC Meeting - OilPrice.com
articles.description: As OPEC prepares for its next meeting to discuss easing its oil output restrictions for the group, Europe and the United States are possibly staring down the barrel of the Delta variantand that combination of factors is sending oil prices sharply downward
